ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The operation names are listed in UpperCamelCase (i.e. GetCapabilities, DescribeSensor, GetObservation, other – if implemented)

ctl:message.select: concat('Checking operation ', $operationName)

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAIL: Operation name must be UpperCamelCase (GetCapabilities)
FAIL: Operation name must be UpperCamelCase (DescribeSensor)
FAIL: Operation name must be UpperCamelCase (GetObservation)
FAIL: Operation name must be UpperCamelCase (GetObservationById)
FAIL: Operation name must be UpperCamelCase (GetFeatureOfInterest)

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.2
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The ObservationOffering for the whole network is listed, and gml:id and gml:name for that offering is in lower case (e.g. gml:id#"urn_ioos_network_all" and urn:ioos:network:all)

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAIL: "all" offering gml:id is not lowercase
FAIL: "all" offering gml:name is not lowercase

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.3
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The ows:ExtendedCapabilities contains valid ioosTemplateVersion value.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAIL: ioosTemplateVersion/gml:version is missing or empty

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.4
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The ows: ExtendedCapabilities contains valid softwareVersion value.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAIL: softwareVersion/gml:version is missing or empty

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidOutputFormat.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The values in the ows:Parameter name#"outputFormat" element contain "text/xml;subtype#"sensorML/1.0.1/profiles/ioos_sos/1.0""

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAIL: DescribeSensor outputFormat AllowedValues not found

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAIL: ows:Operation[@name='DescribeSensor' must have allowed outputFormat 'text/xml;subtype="sensorML/1.0.1/profiles/ioos_sos/1.0"'

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidOutputFormat.2
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The values in the responseFormat element(s) for each ObservationOffering contain ‘text/xml; subtype=“om/1.0.0/profiles/ioos_sos/1.0”’

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: responseFormat text/xml;subtype="om/1.0.0/profiles/ioos_sos/1.0" not found in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidSRSName.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: If ObservationOffering for the network provides gml:srsName, then it has the value "EPSG:4326"

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: gml:srsName is not EPSG:4326 in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidSRSName.2
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: If ObservationOffering for the network does not provide gml:srsName, then element gml:boundedBy/gml:Envelope has the attribute "srsName" with the value "http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326"

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: No gml:boundedBy in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: No gml:Envelope in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: No gml:Envelope srsName attribute in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: gml:Envelope/@srsName != ''http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326'' in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidTimeFrame.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Each sos:ObservationOffering provides beginPosition and endPosition values of TimePeriod, and (a) beginPosition value is not later than endPosition; (b) beginPosition value is in ISO 8601 format (e.g. 2009-05-23T00:00:00.000Z), and (c) endPosition has either an inline value in ISO 8601 format or an attribute "indeterminatePosition#"now"".

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: No sos:time in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: No sos:time/gml:TimePeriod in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: No sos:time/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: sos:time/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition is empty in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: No sos:time/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: sos:time/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition is empty in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: gml:beingPosition is after gml:endPosition in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: gml:beginPosition is not a valid ISO 8601 date in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: gml:endPosition does not have ISO 8601 date or indeterminate position in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: gml:endPosition is not a valid ISO 8601 date in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: gml:endPosition/@indeterminatePosition != ''now'' in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidProcedure.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Each ObservationOffering provides just a single procedure, and the procedure value is (a) a URN that conforms to the IOOS Conventions for Observing Asset Identifiers, and (b) matches the gml:name value for this ObservationOffering.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: No sos:procedure in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: More than one sos:procedure in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: No sos:procedure/xlink:href in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: sos:procedure/@xlink:href is not a valid IOOS asset URN in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: No gml:name in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: sos:procedure/@xlink:href != gml:name in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidObservedProperty.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Each ObservationOffering provides at least one fully qualified sos:observedProperty element with the values of URLs corresponding to a Climate and Forecast (CF) Standard Name of the record in one of the IOOS Vocabularies.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: No sos:observedProperty in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: sos:observedProperty (', @xlink:href, ') is a fake parameter vocabulary in ObservationOffering ', $offeringGmlId)
concat('FAIL: sos:observedProperty (', @xlink:href, ') is not a term in a valid parameter vocabulary in ObservationOffering ', $offeringGmlId)

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidObservedProperty.2
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: None of the sos:observedProperty elements provides a value of vector phenomenon (i.e. wind, wave, current) instead of a scalar components of a composite phenomenon describing the vector, and defined in the IOOS Parameter Vocabulary (e.g.: http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/parameter/wave).

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: No sos:observedProperty in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: sos:observedProperty contains the vector ''http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/parameter/wave'' (must be scalar) in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: sos:observedProperty contains the vector ''http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/parameter/wind'' (must be scalar) in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: sos:observedProperty contains the vector ''http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/parameter/current'' (must be scalar) in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)

ctl:test.name: getCapabilities:IOOS-SOS.GetCapabilities-ResponseContainsValidResponseMode.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Each ObservationOffering provides a valid responseMode value (i.e. one of the "inline", "out-of-band", "attached", "resultTemplate" strings).

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: No sos:responseMode in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
concat('FAIL: sos:responseMode had invalid value in ObservationOffering ', @gml:id)
